name: Outbreak (itch) (Oxyo)
description:
Inputs :

                   Z Q S D : Move

                  Escape : Pause

Description :

     In Outbreak, you are a hungriest zombie that ever was, your one and only goal is to eat all humans existing, in order to stay "alive"

Scout the ruined cities searching for your next meal and eat them all !

Beware, you can't walk indefinitely, and the humans move when you move, so plan accordingly to eat everyone in the shortest ammount of step.
